main event: Microfilm publication of Project Blue Book containing case files of individual UFO sightings from 1837-1999.
interesting points: The microfilm covers UFO sightings for the period of August 5-27, 1952., The publication includes case files with file numbers ranging from 1837 to 1999., Project Blue Book was a systematic study of UFOs conducted by the U.S. Air Force., The archives provide historical context for UFO sightings., The microfilm was published by The National Archives in 1976.
sighted object: UFOs reported in various individual case files
